TestReportSteps.testObjective: To verify that user is able to view hotspot report.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Invoke the hotspot report API /api/blackspots/standardreport. Verify hotspot report.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify hotspot report.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify hotspot report.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify hotspot report.
